HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Standardni rok isporuke je do 3 radna dana ovisno o lokaciji isporuke i dostupnosti proizvoda.

HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Rok isporuke za otoke i udaljena područja može biti produljen za 1-2 dana, ovisno o dostavnom partneru. Dostava na otoke vrši se u skladu s redom plovidbe i rasporedom dostave odabrane kurirske službe.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Rok isporuke za otoke i udaljena područja može biti produljen za 1-2 dana, ovisno o dostavnom partneru. Dostava na otoke vrši se u skladu s redom plovidbe i rasporedom dostave odabrane kurirske službe.

SUMMARY:
SUMMARY: HGspot provides home delivery throughout Croatia. Standard delivery costs a flat rate of €4.99 with a timeframe of up to 3 business days. Delivery for bulky items, such as white goods, is priced based on weight, ranging from €4.99 to €100.00. In-store pickup is an available option at their physical store locations. The website does not mention parcel shop or parcel locker delivery options.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Same-day express delivery is offered for €11.00 in Zagreb, Split, Rijeka, Osijek, Pula, Varaždin, Zadar, and Vinkovci for orders placed on weekdays before 3:00 PM. Deliveries to islands may experience a delay of 1-2 days. No free shipping threshold is mentioned.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a dedicated 'Dostava' page and is generally clear and easy to understand. Pricing for standard and bulky items is well-defined. However, the page does not specify the courier partners used, nor does it provide information on Cash on Delivery (COD) options or weekend deliveries. Details about in-store pickup are inferred from the express delivery section rather than being explicitly stated as a separate delivery method.
